title: Would HR 1 Ensure Millions of ‘Illegal Immigrants’ Are Registered to Vote?
subtitle: In an op-ed for The Daily Signal, former Vice President Mike Pence criticized the Democrats' voting rights reform bill.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: The For the People Act of 2021, also known as U.S. H.R.1, would ensure "that millions of illegal immigrants are quickly registered to vote" by forcing states to adopt universal mail-in ballots, early voting, same-day voter registration, online voter registration, and automatic voter registration.
